content: In San Bernardino County, @ArrowheadRMC began administering the first doses of the #PfizerBioNTech #COVID19 vaccine to frontline #HealthcareWorkers today. The #CoronavirusVaccine shipment on @SBCOUNTYFIRE truck was escorted by @Colton_PD . @latimesphotos @latimes
date: 11:43 AM · Dec 17, 2020 from Colton, CA·Twitter for iPhone
